mapper.select: SELECT room_code, room_type FROM reserve_guest WHERE room_type = #{roomType} AND status = 1 AND room_code IN ( SELECT room_code FROM reserve_guest WHERE room_type = #{roomType} AND ( (DATE(#{startTime}) < DATE(start_time) AND DATE(#{endTime}) > DATE(start_time)) OR (DATE(#{startTime}) = DATE(start_time) AND DATE(end_time) > DATE(#{endTime})) OR (DATE(#{startTime}) = DATE(start_time) AND DATE(#{endTime}) = DATE(end_time)) OR (DATE(#{startTime}) > DATE(start_time) AND DATE(#{startTime}) < DATE(end_time) AND DATE(#{endTime}) = DATE(end_time)) OR (DATE(#{startTime}) > DATE(start_time) AND DATE(#{startTime}) < DATE(end_time) AND DATE(#{endTime}) > DATE(end_time)) ) )
